subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Smith, a 6-foot-11 center, played on men’s basketball national runner-up teams in 2010 and 2011 and finished with 1,147 points and 648 rebounds.
snippet: Smith, a 6-foot-11 center, played on men’s basketball national runner-up teams in 2010 and 2011 and finished with 1,147 points and 648 rebounds.
